Name: Antigua and Barbuda
Description: A small island nation in the Caribbean, known for its beautiful beaches and tourism industry.

Name: Bahamas
Description: An island country in the Caribbean, famous for its clear blue waters and luxury tourism.

Name: Barbados
Description: A small Caribbean island nation known for its culture, beaches, and tourism.

Name: Belize
Description: A Central American country with Caribbean coastline, known for its barrier reef and diverse wildlife.

Name: Canada
Description: The second-largest country in the world, known for its natural landscapes and multicultural cities.

Name: Costa Rica
Description: A Central American country known for its biodiversity, rainforests, and ecotourism.

Name: Cuba
Description: An island nation in the Caribbean, famous for its music, history, and old cars.

Name: Dominica
Description: A mountainous Caribbean island nation known for its natural hot springs and rainforests.

Name: Dominican Republic
Description: A Caribbean nation that shares the island of Hispaniola with Haiti, known for its beaches and resorts.

Name: El Salvador
Description: The smallest country in Central America, known for its Pacific coastline and volcanic landscapes.

Name: Grenada
Description: A small island nation in the Caribbean, known as the Spice Isle for its nutmeg plantations.

Name: Guatemala
Description: A Central American country rich in Mayan history, volcanoes, and biodiversity.

Name: Haiti
Description: A Caribbean country that shares the island of Hispaniola with the Dominican Republic.

Name: Honduras
Description: A Central American country known for its ancient Mayan ruins and natural beauty.

Name: Jamaica
Description: A Caribbean island nation famous for reggae music, beaches, and lush landscapes.

Name: Mexico
Description: A large North American country known for its ancient civilizations, beaches, and rich culture.

Name: Nicaragua
Description: A Central American country known for its lakes, volcanoes, and colonial architecture.

Name: Panama
Description: A Central American country known for the Panama Canal and its role in global trade.

Name: Saint Kitts and Nevis
Description: The smallest sovereign state in the Western Hemisphere, known for its beaches and volcanic landscapes.

Name: Saint Lucia
Description: A Caribbean island nation known for its volcanic mountains and beautiful beaches.

Name: Saint Vincent and the Grenadines
Description: A Caribbean island chain known for sailing, tourism, and volcanic landscapes.

Name: Trinidad and Tobago
Description: A Caribbean country known for its diverse culture, Carnival, and petroleum industry.

Name: United States
Description: One of the world s largest and most powerful countries, known for its economic and cultural influence.
